home.title: Web Developer, Network Enthusiast, Video Editor
home.description: Hey! I’m Destio, an Informatics Engineering graduate passionate about web development, video editing, and networking. I’ve built many web apps during college and love experimenting with servers. Outside tech, I enjoy editing videos and making music for fun.
